english.subject: eng
english.paragraph: The rapid advancement of artificial intelligence has sparked a global debate about the future of work. While some experts predict massive job displacement, others argue that AI will create new categories of jobs that we cannot yet imagine. The key challenge lies in reskilling the workforce to adapt to this technological shift.
english.question: What is the primary concern regarding AI mentioned in the paragraph?
